data.name: AccordionAlt
data.value: Click to expand

data.name: AccordionHeader
data.value: Important information

data.name: AccordionParagraph1
data.value: On selecting your new tariff if we feel that, based on your known historical consumption and any debit balances, there’s a reasonable risk that the Direct Debit amounts would not be enough to cover your usage, we retain the right to conduct a review of your Direct Debit payment amounts. If this is the case, you’ll receive a letter confirming these new amounts.

data.name: AccordionParagraph2
data.value: We may change your payment method if you have any outstanding charges on your gas and/or electricity account(s) and/or do not comply with the terms and conditions relating to that payment method. We’ll write to you letting you know of the change at least seven working days before it begins to apply, in accordance with our Licences. If we change your payment method from Direct Debit to quarterly billing then you’ll no longer benefit from the Direct Debit discount.

data.name: AccordionParagraph3
data.value: If you select a new tariff on this website, you’ll stay with your current SSE brand.

data.name: AccordionParagraph4
data.value: Please read the Terms & Conditions for the {0} tariff below. Please read our full Terms & Conditions below.

data.name: AccordionParagraph5
data.value: SSE and associated brands: Southern Electric, Scottish Hydro, SWALEC and Atlantic are all trading names of OVO Electricity Limited registered in England and Wales number 06858121 (supply of electricity) and OVO (S) Gas Limited registered in England and Wales number 02716495 (supply of gas). The registered office of OVO Electricity Limited and OVO (S) Gas Limited is 1 Rivergate, Temple Quay, Bristol, BS1 6ED.

data.name: SummaryParagraph1
data.value: We may send your confirmation of contract by email after you’ve confirmed your new tariff selection. You can cancel your agreement without charge within 14 days from the day after the date you signed up to this tariff. We’ll include details of how to cancel when we send this to you. Alternatively, you can get in touch using our contact us page.

data.name: SummaryParagraph2
data.value: If you’re paying by Direct Debit, we’ve calculated the monthly amount by dividing your personal projection by 12 and rounding it up to the nearest pound.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsLabel
data.value: - Terms and Conditions

data.name: Title
data.value: Confirm your order - Choose your new tariff - SSE

data.name: VariableFrequencyText
data.value: Frequency

data.name: VATRateParagraph
data.value: All prices are inclusive of VAT at 5%.

data.name: FixAndProtectAccordionParagraph5
data.value:
SSE is a trading name of OVO Electricity Limited registered in England and Wales number 06858121 (supply of electricity), OVO (S) Gas Limited registered in England and Wales number 02716495 (supply of gas) and OVO (S) Home Services Limited (boiler and heating repair, servicing, cover, boiler Installations and electrical wiring cover). The registered office of OVO Electricity Limited and OVO (S)OVO (S) Gas Limited is 1 Rivergate, Temple Quay, Bristol, BS1 6ED.
The registered office of OVO (S) Home Services Limited is Grampian House, 200 Dunkeld Road, Perth, PH1 3GH. Registered in Scotland No. SC292102. OVO (S) Home Services Limited is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) under reference number 695476. You can check this on the Financial Services Register by visiting the FCA website.

data.name: FixAndProtectConfirmationIntro
data.value: You may get your switching details and Welcome Pack via email for Energy. You will also receive a confirmation of sale letter for your SSE Heating Breakdown Cover separately confirming your product start date. This will include your policy booklet with terms and conditions.

data.name: FixAndProtectSummaryPargraph1
data.value: For SSE Home Services products, your Cancellation Period will be 14 calendar days from the day you receive your confirmation of contract. If you expressly request for SSE to carry out any work during your Cancellation Period, you may need to pay for the work SSE has undertaken.

data.name: FixAndProtectCheckboxLabelHeader
data.value:
By ticking this box, you confirm:

  1. You’re happy to enter into a binding contract with OVO Electricity Limited/OVO (S) Gas Limited for your gas/electricity supply and OVO (S) Home Services Limited for any Home Services products (and, for any insurance products, also AmTrust Europe Limited) for the SSE products I have selected.
  2. I have read and accept the 1 Year Fix and Protect v3 Terms and Conditions (which also includes a summary of the tariff) and the General Terms and Conditions for the Supply of Electricity and/or Gas, and the SSE Breakdown Cover Policy Booklet and the SSE Heating Breakdown Cover Insurance Product Information Document.
  3. I have provided accurate information (not doing so could invalidate your insurance).

data.name: DDPara1
data.value: If you have a fixed price tariff and pay by Direct Debit or standing order, for most fixed tariffs you’ll get a discount of £40 a year for each fuel when compared to other ways of paying. The discount is applied to your standing charge on a pence per day basis, until your tariff ends.

data.name: DDPara2
data.value: If you have a standard variable tariff, your energy prices are capped and the maximum price you pay (known as a cap) is set by Ofgem, the energy regulator. If you pay by Direct Debit or standing order, your standing charge and unit prices will be discounted. Your discount will vary depending on how much energy you use, where you live and your meter type. If you qualified for Warm Home Discount before 1 August 2019, your prices will be discounted regardless of how you pay.

data.name: DDPara3
data.value: Certain tariffs do not qualify for Direct Debit and standing order discounts. Please check the tariff terms and conditions for details.

data.name: OVODisclaimerText
data.value: SSE is now part of the OVO family, which means some of your communications may say SSE Home Services and some may mention OVO (S) Home Services. This will not negatively impact the product or service that you will receive. Please bear with us as we update all of our communications accordingly.
